items.text_for_match: Chukwuemeka secures stoppage-time point for Dortmund against Frankfurt Carney Chukwuemeka scores the second of two stoppage-time goals to bring Borussia Dortmund level with Eintracht Frankfurt, in a thrilling six-goal Bundesliga game.
